ygData.subject: Archers and Quivers
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi!  new to the list.  I play on the Tunare server.  I have a 13 Iksar Monk but have been playing my 5 Wood Elf Ranger lately. My ranger has a quiver that he
ygData.messageBody:
Hi! new to the list. I play on the Tunare server. I have a 13 Iksar Monk
but have been playing my 5 Wood Elf Ranger lately.

My ranger has a quiver that he keeps his arrows in. I saw a tip when I
logged on that says keeping arrows in a quiver decreases attack time. I can
not get him to draw from his quiver. The only arrows he uses are in the
ammo slot. The quiver will not fit in the ammo slot. If I have no arrows
in the ammo slot I get a message "Out Of Ammunition" when I try and use my
bow, even with my quiver full. I have tried putting the quiver on my back
and it won't fit there either. I have asked a bunch of people in game with
no luck, searched the web and looked in my hint book.

While on the subject of archers, my bow and arrows each have a range and
damage rating. My bow is Range 75 Damage 8 (I think). My arrows are Range
25 Damage 1. What is my range and damage? 100 and 9 by adding the numbers,
25 and 1 taking the lower of each? Something else?

Thanks in advance!
